question:
Among the comments with scores between 5 to 10, what is the percentage of the users with 0 up votes?
percentage = DIVIDE(COUNT(UserId where UpVotes = 0 and Score BETWEEN 5 and 10))*100, (COUNT(UserId where Score BETWEEN 5 and 10));
query: SELECT CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN T1.UpVotes = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) * 100 / NULLIF(COUNT(T1.Id), 0) AS per FROM users AS T1 INNER JOIN comments AS T2 ON T1.Id = T2.UserId WHERE T2.Score BETWEEN 5 AND 10
